overview:
43 years old, Master in political science at the Institut d’Etudes Politiques de Paris.

Sophie Paturle-Guesnerot is one of the 4 founders of DEMETER.

She has more than 16 years of experience in private equity in SMEs. She started in this field in 1991 as an investment manager for BTP Capital, specialized investor in the buildings and public works as well as the environment field.

Subsequently, she joined the CrÃ©dit du Nord, then the SociÃ©tÃ© GÃ©nÃ©rale for which she was the associate director in the capital expansion team before joining in 2005 the creation of DEMETER.

Graduate of Sciences-Po Paris in 1987, she started her career as an auditor for PriceWaterhouseCoopers.
